data.text:
John Romaniello Founder of RomanFitnessSystems.com is the author of Man 2.0 Engineering the Alpha: A Real World Guide to an Unreal Life.

Watch this interview: [Video & mp3 included]

-What would you guess his 2 biggest fears are?

-How do you network and get big clients like John?

For much more click below to watch!

Watch the Full Episode

Prefer to listen to Audio instead?

Download Here>> “Right click” here for the mp3

What else will you learn in this interview?

A few of John Romaniello’s accomplishments include the following:

-Arnold Schwarzenegger’s fitness advisor

-Gary Vaynerchuk’s trainer

-Owner/founder of a seven figure affiliate business and web community

-Angel investor in a bunch of the biggest fitness start up

-Check out his book which is about problems with our hormones, lifestyle, diet and psychology preventing guys (and gals) from being as “Alpha” as they’re born to be.

He is the author of Final Phase Fat Loss and co-author of The Super Hero Workout as well.

FUN FACT:

This one you have to watch the first 7 minutes to find out.

Business Mentors, Tools, Books mentioned:

Tim Ferris

Gary V.

A little background about —–:

John Romaniello runs Roman Fitness Systems with a tongue-in-cheek approach to fitness–and himself–that shows a genuine love/hate relationship with both. Equal parts narcissism and self-loathing, Roman writes with passion and humor, show-casing his belief that training doesn’t need to be the serious, stern, science-laden monotony that is pervasive in the industry.
